page.title: ServerlessDays ANZ - Sarah Young
page.description: In this session, I will talk about the security essentials you need to consider when building serverless things. Like it or not, security is everyone's problem but it doesn't need to be that hard with the automated and cloud native tools that exist.

speaker.name: Sarah Young
speaker.title: Serverless security essentials
speaker.bio: Sarah is a Senior Cloud Security Advocate working at Microsoft. She has lived all over the place but currently calls Melbourne home. /n/n/n Sarah has over a decade of experience in tech and is particularly interested in cloud security, container security and good ol' fashioned networking and infrastructure security (having previously worked as a network and voice engineer). /n/n/n Sarah spends most of her spare time speaking at security conferences in various parts of the world, eating hipster brunches and high teas and spending a disproportionate amount of her income on her dogs.

talk.title: Serverless security essentials
talk.abstract: In this session, I will talk about the security essentials you need to consider when building serverless things. Like it or not, security is everyone's problem but it doesn't need to be that hard with the automated and cloud native tools that exist.
